title: Low Fat Chocolate Sponge
ingredients: ['100g cake flour', '25g unsweetened cocoa powder', '300g caster sugar', '90g plain chocolate, grated', '12 egg whites', '1 teaspoon cream of tartar', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 1/2 teaspoons lemon juice', 'icing sugar for dusting (optional)']
